body_html:
Closing; as I think the original issue is resolved now.

@kevinashaw I was unable to reproduce your issue via the following steps:

git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git
cd tensorflow
gedit WORKSPACE # update ndk and sdk entries
bazel build //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so    --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool    --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain    --cpu=armeabi-v7a

when using the 12b NDK. My guess would be that something was incorrect in your WORKSPACE file.

body:
Closing; as I think the original issue is resolved now.

@kevinashaw I was unable to reproduce your issue via the following steps:
```
git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git
cd tensorflow
gedit WORKSPACE # update ndk and sdk entries
bazel build //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so    --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool    --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain    --cpu=armeabi-v7a
```
when using the 12b NDK. My guess would be that something was incorrect in your WORKSPACE file.
